snippet: Still deft at irking opponents, Joakim Noah of the Chicago Bulls is averaging season highs in points, assists, blocks and minutes.
abstract: Profile of Chicago Bulls center Joakim Noah, who is averaging season highs in points, assists, blocks and minutes; Noah is well-known for his ability to throw players off their game with verbal taunts and his skill as a player has grown to match his bravado.

byline.contributor: Nate Taylor contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Still deft at irking opponents, Joakim Noah of the Chicago Bulls is averaging season highs in points, assists, blocks and minutes.

headline.seo: Noah Steps Up His Game for the Bulls
headline.main: Noah Matches His Game to His Bravado
headline.print_headline: Noah Matches His Game to His Bravado
